name: Rush and Blush
description:
Overview

Rush and Blush is a visual novel about Sonic and Blaze slowly developing a romantic relationship toward another.
Sonic loves Blaze, but has trouble expressing his feelings for her.
Yet Blaze loves Sonic, but she also has trouble expressing her feelings for him.
Come help them figuring out what to say so they can win the love of each another!

This project is only a demo, and there is more to come later.
